com.taobao.datax.common.util
类 OracleTnsAssist

java.lang.Object
  com.taobao.datax.common.util.OracleTnsAssist

public class OracleTnsAssist
extends java.lang.Object

A assistant class to parse a tnsfile Usage: OracleTnsAssist assist = OracleTnsAssist.newInstance("/home/hedgehog/tnsnames.ora"); List> details = assist.search("tnsname"); details: [{'SID'='dwdb', 'HOST'='192.168.0.1', 'PORT'='1521'}, {'SID'='dwdb', 'HOST'='192.168.0.2', 'PORT'='1521'}, {'SID'='dwdb', 'HOST'='192.168.0.3', 'PORT'='1521'},]

search

public java.util.List<java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>> search(java.lang.String tnsId)
Search one tns-id in one tns file.

参数：
tnsId - tns id to search
返回：
a list of tns configuration
{"HOST": "hostname", "PORT": "port", "SID": "sid"}.
